subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott made two front-nine bogeys but shot a three-under 67 to get to eight-under 202 and a three-stroke lead heading into the final round of the PGA Tour’s Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex.
snippet: Adam Scott made two front-nine bogeys but shot a three-under 67 to get to eight-under 202 and a three-stroke lead heading into the final round of the PGA Tour’s Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex.
